entities.name: muriel
entities.description: Auntie Muriel is a person who seems to be enjoying herself hugely. She cackled and snapped her fingers for more.

entities.name: lancelot
entities.description: Muriel's cousin Lancelot was a Healer at St. Mungo's at the time.

entities.name: ariana
entities.description: Ariana is a person who was never taken to St. Mungo's and no Healer was ever summoned to see her.

entities.name: elphias
entities.description: Elphias is a person who is being questioned by Auntie Muriel.

relationships.description: Muriel's cousin Lancelot was a Healer at St. Mungo's at the time.
Auntie Muriel is concerned about Ariana and wants to know if she was taken to St. Mungo's.
Lancelot worked as a Healer at St. Mungo's.
